overview:
Gillian Weitz Prozes joined Harrison Metal in August 2008 after a career in product management and marketing. Most recently at Scholastic, Gillian led product marketing for a suite of educational products including READ 180Â®, a breakthrough technology that has helped more than a million struggling readers to achieve success. Prior to Scholastic, Gillian collaborated with Michael at eBay, where she played an integral role in the launch and growth of several new initiatives, including eBay Stores, Buy-It-Now and live chat customer support. Gillian began her career in strategy consulting with The Parthenon Group in Boston.

Gillian holds a BA in Leadership Studies from Williams College, and an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.
